captions.text:
Move your team
two meters to the left.
To your left, to your left.

He had lunch here,
sergeant major.

All right,
you won this one.

Sniper approached the instructor
by being a sneaky bastard,

Do you know the fine
for littering in the state

title: Clear and Present Danger (1/9) Movie CLIP - Sniper Training (1994) HD
